tool_description: Performs statistical analysis on soil testing data including descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, and trend identification across multiple parameters.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs to analyze

parameters.description: Soil parameters to include in statistical analysis

confidence_level.description: Confidence level for statistical intervals (90, 95, or 99)

correlation_threshold.description: Minimum correlation coefficient to report (0.1 to 1.0)

outlier_method.description: Outlier detection method: iqr, z_score, or modified_z_score

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more sample IDs do not exist in the dataset.
Unknown parameters: One or more specified parameters are not available.
Invalid correlation threshold: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Unsupported outlier method: Use one of [iqr, z_score, modified_z_score].
Insufficient data: Need at least 10 samples for meaningful statistical analysis.
usage: Provide sample_ids and parameters for analysis. Optionally configure confidence_level, correlation_threshold, and outlier_method for detailed statistical insights.
